001package squidpony.examples;
002
003import squidpony.squidmath.SobolQRNG;
004
005/**
006 * Created by Tommy Ettinger on 5/2/2015.
007 */
008public class SobolTest {
009    public static void main(String[] args) {
010        for(int d = 1; d <= 20; d++)
011        {
012            SobolQRNG sq = new SobolQRNG(d);
013            sq.skipTo(9000);
014            long[] result;
015            for(int c = 0; c < 10; c++)
016            {
017                result = sq.nextLongVector(100);
018                for(int i = 0; i < d; i++)
019                {
020                    System.out.print(result[i] + " ");
021                }
022                System.out.println();
023            }
024            System.out.println();
025        }
026    }
027}
